title: Mobs & Creatures
description: How well do you know Minecraft's creatures and monsters?

questions.question: What happens when a Creeper is struck by lightning?
questions.explanation: Lightning turns Creepers into Charged Creepers, which have a much more powerful explosion!

questions.question: Endermen take damage from water.
questions.explanation: Endermen are hurt by water and will teleport away when it touches them. Rain also damages them!

questions.question: How do you summon the Wither boss?

options.text: 4 Soul Sand and 3 Wither Skeleton Skulls

questions.explanation: The Wither is summoned by placing 4 Soul Sand in a T-shape and 3 Wither Skeleton Skulls on top!

questions.question: What mob can you ride across lava in the Nether?
questions.explanation: Striders can walk on lava and be ridden using a saddle and warped fungus on a stick!

questions.question: Zombies can break down wooden doors on Hard difficulty.
questions.explanation: On Hard difficulty, zombies can break down wooden doors, making iron doors or other barriers essential!

questions.question: What do Piglins love to trade for?
questions.explanation: Piglins are obsessed with gold! Give them Gold Ingots and they'll barter random items with you.

questions.question: What is dropped by the Ender Dragon when defeated?
questions.explanation: The Ender Dragon drops a Dragon Egg (decorative) and massive amounts of XP. The Elytra is found in End Cities!

questions.question: Iron Golems attack players who hurt villagers.
questions.explanation: Iron Golems protect villagers and will attack any player who harms them. They're incredibly strong!
